attributes.action: ensure the funds from the sale of the stories by the recently released navy personnel goes to help service men and women suffering from psychological problems suffered during the conflict in Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems disgusting that British armed forces personnel should be selling stories of their time in captivity. While I accept that they were in an unknown and potentially harrowing situation this does not reflect well on a government that repeatedly vilifies the propaganda of other countries.
